code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from'react';import LikedIcon from'../Like/LikedIcon.jsx';import UnlikedIcon from'../Like/UnlikedIcon.jsx';import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Like=_ref=>{let{songId}=_ref;const[liked,setLiked]=useState(false);useEffect(()=>{const playlist=JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('playlist'))||[];const song=playlist.find(song=>song.id===songId);if(song&&song.liked){setLiked(true);}},[songId]);const toggleLiked=()=>{setLiked(prevLiked=>!prevLiked);};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{onClick:toggleLiked,children:liked?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(LikedIcon,{}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(UnlikedIcon,{})});};export default Like;
